website_summaries.verdict: This life-size nursery care set is just the right height for most little ones to comfortably stand while they care for their newest patients.
pros: Large dimensions can help make play time a little more realistic
Nursery theme is ideal for kids who can't get enough of baby dolls
Comes with all the baby care essentials and even includes light and sound laptop
cons: The Get Better Babies are sold separately

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute toy! My daughter cannot stop playing with it. Definitely recommend getting the doll that goes with it. Very easy to set up. Everything just clicks together. Only 4 stars because I think it is a bit overpriced in general, but very fun and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves! Careful about the loose screw!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set! My 2.5 yr old loves this kit. We bought her an additional medical kit because this one just comes with the stethoscope and a couple of other things. It was easy to assemble.. got it put together in about 15 minutes. I feel like the company could have gone the extra mile and included batteries for the laptop. My daughter was a little sad that the laptop wouldn’t work without them. ***If you get this, please check the stethoscope because there’s a screw in there that wasn’t all the way in and the batteries popped out when my little girl was playing with this. Definitely could be a choking hazard.***
customer_reviews.author: Ksmom2016

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for any Doc McStuffins fan
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for any Doc McStuffins fan! This was our big gift to our 3 year old this Christmas, she is obsessed! We also made additional purchases to included the Doctors Kit and Baby Cece; well worth it all watching her play!
customer_reviews.author: Ksqwhered

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in great condition. pretty simple snap pieces together add stickers, took me about 20 minutes. Its very cute, kids should have lots of fun with it. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you get it on sale
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves it! The stethoscope only works sometimes. It would have been nice if there were other sound components, like music from the mobile. It was easy to assemble; the pieces just snapped together. There was a broken piece when I opened the box, but it didn't effect the functionality of the toy. I got a deal on Cyber Monday, so overall it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Black

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for my preschooler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. It’s easy to assemble, but there is an irritating flaw..the doc and butterfly will not stay attached to the back. Also, part of the back is cardboard and comes off easily. Other than that, it’s a fun piece for my almost 4 year old. I recommend purchasing the nursery pal doll with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Doc nursery!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 3 year old daughter. Doesn't come with a baby so make sure you buy that as well!

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for what it is. 3 year old daughter loves it. the decorative items come off easily, the cardboard piece got thrown away since it wouldn't stay on. Overall, since she loves it we will keep it. It is cute.

customer_reviews.title: Doc Mcstuffins all in one nursery
customer_reviews.text: Super cute Doc Mcstuffins all in one nursery! Adorable, very durable sweet toy that any little Doc will love. My 3yr old is a huge Doc fan and she plays with this daily. Time for your check up....

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, sturdy and lots of fun buttons/gadgets to play with!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for toddler. She hasn’t seen it yet but we put it together last night to make sure everything was there. It was and it is so cool! I think she will have a lot of fun with all the buttons and gadgets. I want to play with it myself!

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my niece and she loves it! My 1 year old daughter also plays with it when she visits so I would say it is really good for a variety of ages! I would highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money and toddler approved.

She knew right what to do and is getting a lots of use out of this. They do caution the box may be damaged during shipping but we got lucky and it looked fine with no damage to the product. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my grand baby since she loves to pretend she is a doctor and she loves doc McStuffins! She is three and the height was perfect. It was very easy to put together. The material is plastic but not cheap. It is sturdy and very colorful! The laptop is removable and most of the instruments are removable as well. The only one you can’t remove is the stethoscope, which I wish it did because my gbaby loves to listen to everyone’s heart, not just her babies. The crib rocks and fits most of her regular size babies. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: finally put it together last night. my daughter loves playing with it
customer_reviews.author: christina s.

product_meta.title: Doc McStuffins Baby All-in-One Nursery
product_meta.description: Disney Junior's Doc McStuffins is learning all about baby care Thanks to her role as a Chief resident. Preschoolers can nurture and care for their baby dolls right alongside Doc with the all-in-one nursery ‐ an adorable role-play center full of exciting Doctor features and accessories to explore! use Doc's portable electronic patient laptop to diagnose, featuring a light-up screen, sounds and lullaby music. The light & sound stethoscope is perfect for checking baby's heartbeat. When it's time for a checkup, measure baby's height and weight on the scale and use the special nursery tools. After the checkup is complete, give the baby patient a bandage from the sticker dispenser. When it's time for a nap, spin the baby mobile and rock the cradle ‐ the best prescription for sweet dreams! ages 3+.
feature_bullets: Disney Junior's Doc McStuffins is learning all about baby care thanks to her role as a Chief Resident.  Preschoolers can nurture and care for their baby dolls right alongside Doc with the All-in-One Nursery – an adorable role-play center full of exciting doctor features and accessories to explore!
Doc McStuffins Baby Check Up All-in-One Nursery offers top-notch care for your little one’s baby dolls.

Includes: one light and sound stethoscope, one light and sound play laptop, one play baby scale, one play otoscope, one play thermometer, one play bandage, one play aspirator, a baby mobile, a sticker dispenser with fun sticker sheets and a manual rocking cradle.
Set is compatible with the Doc McStuffins My Nursery Palls dolls (sold separately).
Requires three AG-13 or three AAA batteries (not included).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars311 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
